description: Astronomers have detected methane in the nearest known T dwarf, offering new insight into its atmospheric composition. The study further highlights that the carbon abundance in the planet is estimated to be -1.5 dex, while the effective temperature could be around 1,000 K. The author of the paper further revealed that the low metallicity of the T dwarf planet could be due to the non-detection of atomic potassium.
title: Astronomers Detect Methane in the Atmosphere of the Nearest T Dwarf Star to Earth

description: Astronomers confirm Uranus’ rotation period using internal oscillation modeling for the first time. On Uranus, a day just lasts far longer. More precise rotational time observations of the gas giant should enable scientists to plan visits to investigate it. Unlike on Mars and Earth, savage windstorms make it far more difficult to identify the rotation times of the biggest solar system planets.
title: Scientists Finally Discover How Long a Day Lasts on Uranus

description: UPI (Unified Payments Interface) services in India were severely disrupted this Saturday morning, leaving users incapable of making digital transactions, the third time within a month. The snag hits individuals and businesses across the country, disrupting an important daily service for smooth money transfers, which has become a common feature in Indian money transaction businesses.
title: UPI Services Hit by Another Outage, NPCI Says ‘Working to Resolve the Issue’

description: A tectonic slab buried 660km beneath the central US is pulling surface materials downward, causing the Earth's crust to thin across a wide region. The slab, a remnant of the Farallon plate, has been identified through seismic imaging and simulations as the cause of this geological activity. Researchers say this underground movement extends beyond the Midwest, reshaping our understanding of cratonic stability in North America.
title: Farallon Slab Beneath Midwest Pulls Crust Downward, Causing Widespread Thinning

description: In the time of endless scrolling, Logout is courageous to ask what happens when the phone controls our lives. This Hindi film stars Babil Khan and Rasika Dugal and hits Zee5 on April 18 with an introspective plot and powerful performances. This film is awaited by all the netizens eyeing for thrilling scenes and intriguing storyline of questioning the virtual world.
title: Logout OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Babil Khan and Rasika Dugal’s Gripping Film?

description: Chhaava is an intense and legendary Hindi-language period drama that takes viewers to the 17th century and showcases the life and valor of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the warrior son of Shivaji Maharaj. Directed by Laxman Utekar and featuring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Madanna, this historical film portrays the royal conflict, historic battles, and leadership.
title: Vicky Kaushal’s Grand Historical Film Chhaava Now Streaming on Netflix

description: This time the stories are more unusual and promising to keep you on the edge. From witnessing intense emotions to some robust unpredictable sequences, this series is back with promising art performances by the cast. There are six episodes, where each will episode will cover different genres. This star-studded series is worth watching. Watch Black Mirror Season 7 now. Available in English and Hindi languages.   Also, if you haven’t subscribed to Netflix yet? Do it now and enjoy your favorite shows.
title: Black Mirror Season 7 Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: Agnyathavasi is heading for a theatrical release on April 11, 2025. This movie promises exciting suspense, thrill and outstanding performances by the cast. The sequences of investigations will keep you engaged, and some nail-biting revelations will be made that will blow your mind away. This movie is suspected to be one of the most unique murder mysteries the Kannada film Industry has ever witnessed. Watch it at your nearest cinema. The OTT release will be done post-theatrical run, probably on Zee5.
title: Agnyathavasi OTT Release Reportedly Revealed: What You Need to Know
